results.title: Metformin and the Development of Asthma in Patients with Type 2 Diabetes
results.journal: Int J Environ Res Public Health
results.text_hl: Our study demonstrated that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users showed significantly higher risks of @<m>DISEASE_Asthma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@ development, exacerbation, and hospitalization for @<m>DISEASE_Asthma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@ than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ nonusers.

results.title: Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus and Asthma: Pathomechanisms of Their Association and Clinical Implications
results.text_hl: A retrospective cohort study found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ users had a decreased risk of @<m>DISEASE_Asthma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@-related hospitalization (OR = 0.21; 95% CI 0.07-0.63) and @<m>DISEASE_Asthma</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D001249 @@@asthma@@@ exacerbation (OR = 0.39; 95% CI 0.19-0.79) than @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ non-users.
